description: Square array T(k,n) = C(n-1,k) + Sum_{i=0..k} C(n,i) read by antidiagonals (k >= 1, n >= 1).
comments: For k>1, gives maximal number of regions into which k-space can be divided by n hyper-spheres.
references: L. Comtet, Advanced Combinatorics, Reidel, 1974, p. 73, Problem 4.
formula: n hyperspheres divide R^k into at most C(n-1, k) + Sum_{i=0..k} C(n, i) regions.
crossrefs: Apart from left border, same as A059250. A178522 is probably the best version.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 15 2001
